Title: Offred
Writer: Bruce Miller (teleplay by), Margaret Atwood (based on the novel by), Bruce Miller (created for television by)
Actors: Elisabeth Moss, Joseph Fiennes, Yvonne Strahovski, Alexis Bledel
Plot: Offred, one of the few fertile women known as Handmaids in the oppressive Republic of Gilead, struggles to survive as a reproductive surrogate for a powerful Commander and his resentful wife.
